code: var progressAverage=function progressAverage(nums,precision){var total=nums.reduce(function(prev,current){return prev+current;},0);return parseFloat((total/nums.length).toFixed(precision));};export var calculateSectionProgress=function calculateSectionProgress(section){var _section$progress=section.progress,completed=_section$progress.completed,total=_section$progress.total;return parseFloat((completed/total*100).toFixed(0));};export var calculateCourseProgress=function calculateCourseProgress(course){var precision=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;var sections=course.sections;var progresses=sections.map(calculateSectionProgress);return progressAverage(progresses,precision);};export var calculateSemesterProgress=function calculateSemesterProgress(semester){var precision=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;var courses=semester.courses;var progresses=courses.map(calculateCourseProgress);return progressAverage(progresses,precision);};export var calculateDiplomaProgress=function calculateDiplomaProgress(diploma){var precision=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:0;var semesters=diploma.semesters;var progresses=semesters.map(calculateSemesterProgress);return progressAverage(progresses,precision);};
